feed.title: Inspired Alberta
feed.subtitle: Technology, new ideas, and the best of Alberta

entry.title: The Why
entry.content:
Background

Hello world! This blog will be my place on the internet to share what Iâ€™m up to and what I believe in. Topics will include the Alberta wilderness, renewable energy, hands on projects, as well as being a general outlet for my mind. While it may seem a bit unstructured at the moment, my goal is to adapt on the fly and see what I really enjoy writing about.

I hope you get some value out of it and will join me for the ride.
